name: modular-ecommerce-platform
description: Modular e-commerce platform with micro frontends and shared backend

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.install-frontend: cd frontend/shell && npm install && cd ../products && npm install && cd ../cart && npm install && cd ../users && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.start-all: concurrently "npm run start-backend" "npm run start-shell" "npm run start-products" "npm run start-cart" "npm run start-users" "npm run start-admin"
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend/shell && npm run build && cd ../products && npm run build && cd ../cart && npm run build && cd ../users && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build
scripts.test-login: curl -X POST http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"email": "admin@example.com", "password": "password123"}' || echo 'Login test failed'
scripts.cleanup: lsof -ti:3000,3001,3002,3003,3004,5000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No processes to kill'
scripts.setup-mongodb: docker run -d -p 27017:27017 --name ecommerce-mongodb -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=admin -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=password123 mongo || echo 'MongoDB container already exists or Docker not available'
